name: Mad Max: Fury Road
info: With exhilarating action and a surprising amount of narrative heft, Mad Max: Fury Road brings George Millers post-apocalyptic franchise roaring vigorously back to life.

name: Gravity
info: Alfonso Cuar√≥ns Gravity is an eerie, tense sci-fi thriller thats masterfully directed and visually stunning.

name: The Dark Knight
info: Dark, complex, and unforgettable, The Dark Knight succeeds not just as an entertaining comic book film, but as a richly thrilling crime saga.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
info: The Two Towers balances spectacular action with emotional storytelling, leaving audiences both wholly satisfied and eager for the final chapter.

name: Parasite
info: An urgent, brilliantly layered look at timely social themes, Parasite finds writer-director Bong Joon Ho in near-total command of his craft.

name: Lady Bird
info: Lady Bird delivers fresh insights about the turmoil of adolescence -- and reveals writer-director Greta Gerwig as a fully formed filmmaking talent.
Hard-hitting, immersive, and an impressive technical achievement, 1917 captures the trench warfare of World War I with raw, startling immediacy.

name: Avengers: Endgame
info: Exciting, entertaining, and emotionally impactful, Avengers: Endgame does whatever it takes to deliver a satisfying finale to Marvel's epic Infinity Saga.

name: Hamilton
info: Look around, look around at how beautifully Hamilton shines beyond Broadway - and at how marvelously Thomas Kail captures the stage show's infectious energy.
